You will need to file a new issue in the WordPress Playground repository and paste this error message there: https://github.com/WordPress/wordpress-playground/issues/new If you're a core developer, the typical fix is to: * Isolate a minimal reproduction of the error * Add a reproduction of the error to php-asyncify.spec.ts in the WordPress Playground repository * Run 'npm run fix-asyncify' * Commit the changes, push to the repo, release updated NPM packages Below is a list of all the PHP functions found in the stack trace to help with the minimal reproduction.
